original_text: So Abram went up from Egypt to the Negev, with his wife and everything he had, and Lot went with him.
korean_text: 아브람이 애굽에서 그와 그의 아내와 모든 소유와 롯과 함께 네게브로 올라가니

sentences.original_text: So Abram went up from Egypt to the Negev
with his wife and everything he had
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내와 그가 가진 모든 것을 가지고
